title: Gopherbot confuses CL and Bug numbers
body:
E.g. CL https://golang.org/cl/10483 mentions `CL 10296`, but gopherbot thought it is issue 10296, and mistakenly posted a message to #10296 that the CL mentions it.

Proposal: check only numbers prefixed with `#`, e.g. `#10296`.

Question: where is gopherbot source code?
